snippet: Some inconvenient realties behind dueling manifestos on global warming science and solutions.
abstract: Some inconvenient realties behind dueling manifestos on global warming science and solutions.
lead_paragraph: The last few days have seen frenzied volleys in the fight over climate science and policy, beginning with a 16-author op-ed article in The Wall Street Journal on Friday and, most recently, with a 39-author rebuttal published today in the paper. Most of the authors in both camps are scientists.

headline.main: In Climate Fight, Tracking the Line Between Diagnosis and Treatment
